{
	dataproduct(
		id: "{{ .dataproduct_id }}"
	) {
		id
		name
		description
		repo
		pii
		owner { group }
		keywords
	}
}

RETURNS

{
  "data": {
    "dataproduct": {
      "name": "NewName",
      "description": "New description",
      "keywords": [
        "keyword1"
      ],
      "owner": {
        "group": "dataplattform@nav.no"
      },
      "pii": false,
      "repo": "somerepo"
    }
  }
}
